sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import APIURL from '../../Services/Globals' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import TasksList from "../Tasks/TasksList"; import { authHeader } from '../../Services/AuthService' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ detailsConteiner: { margin: "8px", background: theme.palette.grey[800], padding: '1.5rem', color: theme.palette.text.primary, }, title: { margin: "-1.5rem", textAlign: 'center', padding: '1px', backgroundColor: theme.palette.primary.main, boxShadow: theme.shadows[2], }, gridConteiner: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: `1fr 1fr`, gridTemplateRows: "1fr ", justifyContent: "space-evenly", alignContent: "center", marginTop: "0.5rem", '& p': { margin: "5px", display: 'inline', fontSize: "17px" }, '& h3': { margin: "5px", display: 'inline', } }, permitionChip: { margin: "2px", marginLeft: "5px", boxShadow: theme.shadows[2], fontSize: "14px", fontWeight: "501" } })); const JobApplicationView = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [application, setApplication] = useStylesuseState({}); const params = useParams(); useEffect(() => { getApplication(params.id); }, []) const getApplication = async (ID) => { const requestOptions = { method: 'Get', headers: new Headers({ 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': authHeader() }) }; await fetch(APIURL + `JobApplications/` + ID, requestOptions ) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setApplication(data)); } return (

Job Application Details:

{application.person === undefined ? null :

Candidate Info

Name:

{application.person.name}

Surname:

{application.person.surname}

Phone Number:

{application.person.phoneNumber}

Email:

{application.person.email}

Candidate Address:

City:

{application.person.employeeAddress.city}

Street:

{application.person.employeeAddress.street}

Post Code:

{application.person.employeeAddress.postCode}

}

Job Application Details:

{application.person === undefined ? null :

Occupation info

Application Date:

{application.ApplicationDate.toString().split('T')[0]}

Position:

{application.position.name}

Expected Salary:

{application.ExpectedSalary}

Application Content:

{application.Content}

}
); } export default JobApplicationView;
